channel.title: Making a command impossible to do in wildy
channel.description: I want to make my command, ::food, not usable in wildy. Just like the banking emote, where it says, "you cannot bank above..." I want it to be like that, how do I make it like that?

item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Try this else if (command.startsWith("food")) addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) { sendMessage("I won't give you food above Y 3712 wildy."); } }
